name: Space Beer
description:
In a distopic future in the year 2500  the space government has decided to close all private crafting of beer except the one run by the prime minister. What a coincidence! But you, the space pirate James McFly, won't allow a life without beer. With your spaceship, rebel spirit and with the help of clandestine beer breweries, will share the gift of the beer across the galaxy!

Your allies have placed the beer in a dangerous asteroid belt far away of the space government's clutches. Send to the people the opportunity of a refresment cold as the space with the prepared portals. But be careful, your ship needs beer to function too.
